name: Frog The Princess
description:
Story:

In a land far far away, evil striked again.

During the Royal Wedding, a  witch appeared and cast an ancient malediction. The Princess would be transformed into a filthy HUMAN, until the end of times.

The realm was desperate and the prince ran away. 

But a real Hero, Froggy,  decided he was the chosen one . 
The only one who could save the princess and the kingdom.

But he knew he would need some guidance.

Will you help Froggy frog the Princess?

Gameplay:

You will have to jump from one safe point to the next one in a given amount of time until you reach the end of the level.

Through this adventure you will go through over 40 levels with more than 10 different atmosphere. Gathering coins you will level up your skills and get a better frog.

Starting from your original pond, you will go through lava, icy caves, mountain rivers  and many other magnificent places to save the princess.

With its Arcade principles this game will require you to have mechanical and observational skills.

This mobile game will be playable with Android(7.0 +) and IOs.
And we currently not aim to deploy it on any other platform.

DEMO / Current Version:

The game is not out yet but you can try an Android demo of it. 

Any advices/suggestion/comments would be highly appreciated and if you find a bug please tell us your android version and mobile phone (ty <3).

Versions:

0.20 : has been tested on android 7.0 and more.

Other: You can find more at : Instagram  AoStudio.fr 

Hope you will enjoy and comment on this page.
Thank you for reading me! <3
